about_the_game:
Bond with your friend and become a part of the Antivirus Special Forces as you head to the heart of the PC. Solve electrifying puzzles to regain control over the infected CPU.

Bytebond is an asymmetric co-op puzzle game that takes place inside the computer. Cooperate with a friend in an online or classic split-screen experience using unique gameplay mechanics about managing energy.

SOLVE PUZZLES TOGETHER

Each player has a distinct role in completing different puzzles. One can only collect energy from the environment, while the other can only pass it back into the components, powering various mechanisms that pass you through. Sometimes you have to fight virus bots met along the way.


EXPERIENCE A JOURNEY INSIDE THE COMPUTER

As an Antivirus Special Force Unit, you have been plugged into the computer to regain control over the infected CPU. Explore different computer components and use your skills to defeat the virus.


PLAY TOGETHER WHEREVER YOU ARE

Choose between playing online and split-screen mode however you want! It depends only on you and your friends, regardless of where you are and how you want to play.

This is a demo version of the game containing the first chapter.

The game was designed for two players, works great with Steam Remote Play Together.

Best experienced with controllers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
